paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The variants KCNH2:p.R823W, SCN5A:p.V2016M and CACNA1C:p.R858H were present in 1 individual each.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was independently validated by Sanger capillary sequencing.
key_quotes: The variants KCNH2:p.R823W, SCN5A:p.V2016M and CACNA1C:p.R858H were present in 1 individual each.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in KCNH2 was reported in the paper.
